data.author: Aesop
data.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

data.author: George Washington
data.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

data.author: Thomas Carlyle
data.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.

data.author: Sun Tzu
data.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.

data.author: Amelia Earhart
data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

data.author: Aristotle Onassis
data.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
data.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

data.author: Steven Cuoco
data.quote: You are your own best friend. Listen to yourself more often than someone else.

data.author: Steven Cuoco
data.quote: You deserve more in your life. Think big. Love more and share beyond your limits. You will then become limitless.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: How vain it is to sit down to write when you have not stood up to live.

data.author: Salman Rushdie
data.quote: The only people who see the whole picture, are the ones who step out of the frame.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future;it is something you design for the present.

data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam
data.quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation

data.author: Richard Branson
data.quote: To be successful, you have to be out there, you have to hit the ground running, and if you have a good team around you and more than a fair share of luck, you might make something happen. But you certainly cant guarantee it just by following someone elses formula.

data.author: Azim Premji
data.quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small. Image

data.author: Mark Zuckerberg
data.quote: I think a simple rule of business is, if you do the things that are easier first, then you can actually make a lot of progress.

data.author: Warren Buffet
data.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.

data.author: Narayana Murthy
data.quote: Progress is often equal to the difference between mind and mindset.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they cant lose.
